channel.title: Easy eBooks [start learning now]
channel.description:
[center][size=6][u]Easy eBooks[/u][/size]
Well i hope these are useful to most of you who dont know any languages, i can tell you that eBooks helped me with learning the basics and they still are.
[size=4][u]For Starters[/u][/size] [b]PHP:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/282439212/HOWTO.rar [b]CSS:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/273260465/0596802447.rar [b]HTML:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/281560855/HTML4_Ron_RealWarez.org.rar [b]C:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/221656922/Learn_C_programming_language_in_24_hours.rar [b]C++:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/281330942/Visual_C___6_For_Dummies.rar [b]C#:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/276638184/C__2.0_The_Complete_Reference__Second_Edition_-_McGraw_Hill_--www.DevilsDivine.info--.rar [b]Java:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/279132693/Wiley_Publishing__Java_in_60_Minutes_a_Day.www.dl4all.com.pdf.rar [b]JavaScript:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/281090246/Javascript_for_Dummies_Quick_Reference.rar [b]Python:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/264954673/tutor.pdf
[size=4][u]Advanced Users[/u][/size] [b]Big Java:[/b] http://uploading.com/files/C4QLOOK1/Big_Java.rar.html [b]CSS The Missing Manual:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/273260465/0596802447.rar [b]HTML / XHTML - The Definitive Guide:[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/100970547/0_reilly-Html_And_Xhtml__The_Definitive_Guide.-_5th_Ed.rar [b]JavaScript Bible:[/b] http://www.uploading.com/files/9KJ62SA5/Js.Bible.6th.Ed_virTuAlZin.rar.html
[size=6][u]Sites[/u][/size] [b]Custom java eBook:[/b] http://www.moparisthebest.com/java/ [b]w3school:[/b] http://www.w3schools.com/ [b]Java.sun:[/b] http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/
Have any suggestions or requests on what i can edit in here?[/center]

item.title: Easy eBooks [start learning now]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Lothy:

Sounds like an absolutely rubbish collection. Learn C in 24 hours? Visual C for dummies? Java in 60 minutes at day? Do try to use real resources.

I’ll try give it a edit today

MujaheD:

Mopars custom java eBook? Moparisthebest wrote that?

Mopar was the one who sent me it so i thought he wrote it

Mopman:

don’t remember mopar having any books published on addison-wesley

eczema3:

The PHP eBook sucked dick. Almost half the 2.5mb PDF was telling you about HTML and how to upload & set up and FTP server, not teaching you how to write PHP scripts… Also, it contained a learn C pdf, and some hibernate in actions shit.

Try keeping cool im going to add advanced and for starters section later on

Read full topic

item.title: Easy eBooks [start learning now]

Well i hope these are useful to most of you who dont know any languages, i can tell you that eBooks helped me with learning the basics and they still are.
